name: Skull of Shedda
button_tooltip:
Launches a skull at a target enemy unit or location. The skull is controllable and can detonate on an enemy unit to <Bold>Curse</> it and retain vision of nearby units for 10 seconds.

<Purple>Detector</>

<AttackCallout>Cursed units take damage over time and spawn a Phantom if they die.</>

name: Skymine
button_tooltip: Launches a flying mine at a target location that lasts for 120 seconds. Upon activation by an enemy air unit, it will chase down its target and detonate, dealing 50 damage to enemy air units in the area, slowing them down for 10 seconds.

name: Solar Habitat
button_tooltip: Provides 20 supply. Can use the Solar Charge ability.

button_tooltip:
Power provider and defensive structure. Consumes energy to attack. Can morph back into a Gracelight Node or an Energizer Node.

button_tooltip:
Generates a controllable Dimensional Storm which deals 32 damage per second to all enemy units in it's vortex. Additionally, the Dimensional Storm will deal 2 times more damage to structures.

Dimensional Storms have a 30 second timed life duration.

This unit will be destroyed upon casting this ability.
